channel.title: Fieldwork on Hugh's Curriculum Vitae
channel.description: Recent content in Fieldwork on Hugh's Curriculum Vitae

item.title: Meꞌphaa and Sochiapam Chinantec Keyboards
item.description: Revolutionizing text input. We moved text input from being on a single OS via a non-unicode input method, to working on multiple OSes in Unicode.

item.title: Meꞌphaa Language Documentation
item.description: A collaboration with an experienced linguist. I contributed extensive metadata and technical audio-visual expertise a team of people from the USA and Meꞌphaa speakers.
